website_summaries.verdict: The EiR sunscreen stick is well-loved by surfers, who need serious protection. The product can be a bit dry and hard to apply, though.
pros: A strong, thick sunscreen for surfing, hiking and other active sports
Contains zinc oxide for UV sun protection
Contains cocoa butter for deep hydration and  antioxidants that fight free radicals
cons: Product is a little hard and dry

customer_reviews.title: Packaging undermines the product
customer_reviews.text: The product is already a bit on the hard/dry side, and I think the cardboard packaging further leeches out any moisture. Maybe the manufacturers are trying to be environmentally conscious, but I think a refillable plastic tube is worth exploring -- so only refills could be sold in cardboard. There's something about the dry plug of product scraping past the cardboard when in use that makes my skin crawl, same as when I wipe a wooden spoon with a dishtowel. Just me? Probably. I appreciate the all-natural (and minimal) ingredients, and I think the product could smell delicious except the cardboard is the dominant smell.
customer_reviews.author: Suzana Norberg

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Face Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Love this mud stick - it's great for easy application to the face and shoulders! Smells delicious, and definitely keeps the sunburns at bay - we used it during our travels around the Yucatan, it was perfect to reapply throughout a day of playing in the sun and surf. Plus it keeps its consistency in a hot car - it doesn't turn to a sticky mess. Highly recommended - look forward to trying other EiR NYC products.

product_meta.title: EiR NYC - All Natural Surf Mud Pro Stick (Waterproof sunscreen for face, Approx. SPF 50)
product_meta.description:
EiR NYC is an active lifestyle natural body care line. EiR uses fresh, top quality elixirs of essential oils and organic herbs to nourish the body while protecting and healing the skin. Named after the Nordic goddess who used nature’s bounty as salves for the body, spirit and soul, EiR is made for people with a commitment to wholesome, ecologically sound products. 



Cocoa Butter 

A highly nourishing and protective emollient that readily absorbs into the skin. 


Coconut Oil 

Extracted from the kernel of matured coconuts, coconut oil is known to reduce inflammation, support tissue healing, functions as a protective antioxidant, aids the natural chemical balance of the skin, softens skin, and helps to relieve dryness and flaking. 


Zinc Oxide 

Anti-irritant and antioxidant, helps to reduce free radical damage, maintain healthy skin and protect skin from the sun.
